name: Xpertfind
tag_list: rated-tradesmen, matching-homeowners-with-tradesmen, home-improvement, tilers, carpentersjoiners, paintingdecorating, gardening, plasterersrenderers, roofers, floor-fitters, gardeners, diy, bathroom-fitters, plumbers, paintersdecorators, plasteringrenderi
overview:
Xpertfind.com is an online service company matching homeowners with reliable tradesmen to complete a variety of home improvement projects.

We provide the homeowner with free quotes from reliable, local tradesmen, while providing tradesmen with hundreds of local, validated jobs to choose for work. The process is simple. Homeowners post their home improvement projects, and the registered tradesmen are matched to these jobs. The tradesmen can choose to work when and how much they want. Posting a job is free. There are no joining fees or membership contracts.
